title: Malware Scheduled Task Detected on DESKTOP-FIN02
summary: An unsigned and malicious executable named svchost32.exe was detected as part of a scheduled task 'WindowsUpdate_Helper'. The file is flagged as dangerous by the majority (34/68) of antivirus engines, indicating high risk.
investigation_steps: Isolate the affected host immediately, block all outbound traffic
Analyze the scheduled task for any additional suspicious indicators
Download and scan the suspect file using multiple antivirus engines for confirmation
Inspect system logs for further activity related to this incident
verdict: Potential malware infection confirmed. Initiate immediate response actions.
